languages.text: "В свете странного совпадения наших идентификационных кодов я нахожу оправданной его гипотезу о существовании... тайного злоумышленника или заговора, действующего в рядах нашего братства".
"In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."
languages.original_text: "В свете странного совпадения наших идентификационных кодов я нахожу оправданной его гипотезу о существовании... тайного злоумышленника или заговора, действующего в рядах нашего братства".

traits.locale_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of... a clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."
"In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of... a clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

"In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of... a clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

languages.text: “我们的识别码完全吻合。考虑到这样的古怪事情，我认为他的假设确实有可取之处。也就是说……某种不为人知的邪恶叛徒或阴谋，正在我们修会的内部进行暗中破坏。”
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: “我们的识别码完全吻合。考虑到这样的古怪事情，我认为他的假设确实有可取之处。也就是说……某种不为人知的邪恶叛徒或阴谋，正在我们修会的内部进行暗中破坏。”

languages.text: «A la luz de lo anómalo de nuestros códigos de identificación idénticos, la hipótesis de la existencia de un... agente o conspiración que actúa en secreto en nuestra hermandad adquiere un mérito considerable».
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: «A la luz de lo anómalo de nuestros códigos de identificación idénticos, la hipótesis de la existencia de un... agente o conspiración que actúa en secreto en nuestra hermandad adquiere un mérito considerable».

languages.text: 「我らの識別コードの一致の奇妙さを考慮すると、我らが同法の内部で活動する、秘密裏の悪意あるエージェントまたは陰謀の存在に関する彼の仮説には評価すべき点があるといえるだろう」
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの識別コードの一致の奇妙さを考慮すると、我らが同法の内部で活動する、秘密裏の悪意あるエージェントまたは陰謀の存在に関する彼の仮説には評価すべき点があるといえるだろう」

languages.text: "Angesichts der merkwürdigen Tatsache, dass unsere Identifikationscodes übereinstimmen, halte ich seine Hypothese für möglich. Nämlich dass innerhalb unserer Bruderschaft ein böswilliger geheimer Agent oder eine Verschwörung am Werk ist."
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Angesichts der merkwürdigen Tatsache, dass unsere Identifikationscodes übereinstimmen, halte ich seine Hypothese für möglich. Nämlich dass innerhalb unserer Bruderschaft ein böswilliger geheimer Agent oder eine Verschwörung am Werk ist."

languages.text: « Comme il est très étrange que nos codes d'identification soient les mêmes, je ne peux qu'accorder du mérite à sa théorie quant à l'existence d'un... agent clandestin malveillant ou d'une conspiration au sein de notre confrérie. »
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il est très étrange que nos codes d'identification soient les mêmes, je ne peux qu'accorder du mérite à sa théorie quant à l'existence d'un... agent clandestin malveillant ou d'une conspiration au sein de notre confrérie. »

languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of... a clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

languages.text: "Kimlik saptama kodlarımızın eşleşiyor oluşunun tuhaflığının ışığında, kardeşliğimizde faaliyet gösteren gizli ve kötü niyetli bir ajanın veya komplonun varlığına dair hipotezinde doğruluk payı olduğu kanaatindeyim."
languages.original_text: "In light of the oddness of our matching identification codes, I find merit in his hypothesis as to the existence of a... clandestine malevolent agent or conspiracy operating inside our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Kimlik saptama kodlarımızın eşleşiyor oluşunun tuhaflığının ışığında, kardeşliğimizde faaliyet gösteren gizli ve kötü niyetli bir ajanın veya komplonun varlığına dair hipotezinde doğruluk payı olduğu kanaatindeyim."
